Package com.uzh.ase.dailygrind.userservice.user.repository

Class UserFriendRepository

java.lang.Object
com.uzh.ase.dailygrind.userservice.user.repository.UserFriendRepository
@Repository public class UserFriendRepository extends Object
Repository for managing user friendship entities in DynamoDB. Provides operations related to friend requests, friendships, and user relationships.

  • Method Details

    • isFriend

      public boolean isFriend(String userId, String otherUserId)
      Checks if two users are friends.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the first user
      otherUserId - the ID of the second user
      Returns:
      true if the users are friends and the friendship is accepted, false otherwise

    • findAllFriends

      public List<String> findAllFriends(String userId)
      Retrieves all friends of a specified user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose friends are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of user IDs representing the user's friends

    • createFriendRequest

      public void createFriendRequest(String senderId, String receiverId)
      Creates a new friend request between two users. Adds both incoming and outgoing friendship requests.
      Parameters:
      senderId - the ID of the user sending the friend request
      receiverId - the ID of the user receiving the friend request

    • acceptFriendRequest

      public void acceptFriendRequest(String requestingUserId, String senderId)
      Accepts a pending friend request between two users.
      Parameters:
      requestingUserId - the ID of the user requesting the friendship
      senderId - the ID of the user sending the friend request

    • deleteFriendship

      public void deleteFriendship(String userId, String friendId)
      Deletes the friendship (both incoming and outgoing requests) between two users.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of one user
      friendId - the ID of the other user

    • findUserIdsOfIncomingRequests

      public List<String> findUserIdsOfIncomingRequests(String userId)
      Retrieves a list of user IDs who have sent an incoming friend request to the specified user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user receiving the friend requests
      Returns:
      a list of user IDs representing the senders of incoming friend requests

    • findUserIdsOfOutgoingRequests

      public List<String> findUserIdsOfOutgoingRequests(String userId)
      Retrieves a list of user IDs who have sent an outgoing friend request to the specified user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user who has sent the outgoing friend requests
      Returns:
      a list of user IDs representing the recipients of outgoing friend requests

    • findFriends

      public List<String> findFriends(String userId)
      Retrieves a list of user IDs who are friends with the specified user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose friends are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of user IDs representing the friends of the user

    • existsPendingRequest

      public boolean existsPendingRequest(String senderId, String receiverId)
      Checks if there is a pending friend request between two users.
      Parameters:
      senderId - the ID of the user sending the friend request
      receiverId - the ID of the user receiving the friend request
      Returns:
      true if a pending friend request exists, false otherwise
